issue.title: [Rust] Move parquet code into a separate crate
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4137](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4137). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
To make the project more modular and facilitates better CI, we can move the parquet implementation into a separate sub-crate that depends on arrow.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4137?focusedCommentId=16732726) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3291
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3291>
